=== Others ===

[[Yusuf al-Qaradawi]], a [[Sunni]] cleric and the spiritual leader of the [[Muslim Brotherhood]], issued a [[fatwa]] on 21 February for the assassination of Gaddafi saying that "whoever in the Libyan army is able to shoot a bullet at Mr. Gaddafi should do so."<ref>{{cite news | title = Top Sunni cleric says army should kill Kadhafi | url = http://www.google.com/hostednews/afp/article/ALeqM5i0bbRyEjMASxA90i3tTXp1Fe0Q8A?docId=CNG.aa651167cd0af745b3cb395cf1d402e3.9a1 | date = 2011-02-21 | accessdate=2011-02-21 }}</ref>
+
[[Yusuf al-Qaradawi]], a [[Sunni]] cleric and the spiritual leader of the [[Muslim Brotherhood]]{{citation needed|date=February 2011}}, issued a [[fatwa]] on 21 February for the assassination of Gaddafi saying that "whoever in the Libyan army is able to shoot a bullet at Mr. Gaddafi should do so."<ref>{{cite news | title = Top Sunni cleric says army should kill Kadhafi | url = http://www.google.com/hostednews/afp/article/ALeqM5i0bbRyEjMASxA90i3tTXp1Fe0Q8A?docId=CNG.aa651167cd0af745b3cb395cf1d402e3.9a1 | date = 2011-02-21 | accessdate=2011-02-21 }}</ref>
